Package main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.meeting.event

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeSlideEvent
    An event which when triggered will send the Change Slide message that was received by the server to all of the clients in the meeting
    EndOfAudioSegmentEvent
    This Event will, when triggered, send the original EAUD message to all clients other than the presenter
    Event
    An class extended by classes which describe an action that will be performed on a meeting by an event runner
    GetAllParticipantsEvent
    An event which when triggered will send the user information of all the current participants in a meeting to the client which sent the message that generated this event This includes themselves
    HeartbeatEvent
    An event which when triggered will refresh the heartbeat timer on the client who sent the message that triggered the event
    MessageEventParser
    A Utility class which contains methods used to translate a Message into the event that it represents
    TransmitAudioEvent
    An event which when triggered will transmit the received audio message to all clients in the meeting other than the client which sent the message originally
    UserJoinedEvent
    An event which when triggered will send the user data of the client who sent the message that created this message to everyone except the client themselves
    UserLeftEvent
    An event which when triggered will send a LEFT message to all clients except the client who sent the message that created this event It will then remove the client in question from the meeting and attempt to close the connection to the client
